name: Chief Gustavo

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: This better be important.{gruff mercenary saying hello}

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the basement of Tenpenny Tower?
topics.response_text: You mean the generator room? What the hell do you need to know about that for? That area is strictly off limits.{threatening}

topics.topic_text: Just curious.
topics.response_text: There's an emergency entrance to the tunnels, you know for when the bombs fell. We siphon power from the Metro grid to keep our generators running.

topics.topic_text: Touchy subject, huh? What the matter, hiding some kind of big secret?
topics.response_text: There's no secret. It's just a sensitive area we don't need idiots and assholes screwing around in.{gruff, and getting upset}

topics.topic_text: Never mind. Forget I asked.
topics.response_text: But I've got better things to do than play tour guide, so unless there's some kind of emergency, this conversation's over.{gruff and annoyed}

topics.topic_text: If I promise not to touch anything, will you let me in?
topics.response_text: I've got the only key, and I ain't lending it to you. I lost it once and had to make a new one. Tenpenny practically bit my head off. So forget it.{angry}

topics.topic_text: Look, I'm not an idiot. I won't break anything.
topics.response_text: I don't care who you think you are. You're not getting in down there.{angry}

topics.topic_text: Sorry for bothering you.
topics.response_text: Right.{dismissive}

topics.topic_text: I've met them. Roy Phillips and those other Ghouls don't seem all that bad.
topics.response_text: Look kid. I don't care what you think about them. Unless Tenpenny says otherwise. They aren't allowed in here. End of story. Quit wasting my time.{annoyed}

topics.topic_text: What's it like living at Tenpenny Tower?
topics.response_text: Tenpenny is always on time with the money. And we get fairly comfortable digs with side benefits.{seasoned mercenary happy with current assignment}

topics.topic_text: How's that Ghoul situation coming along?
topics.response_text: That damn Roy Phillips won't take no for an answer. Keeps showing up, looking for a handout. He and his kind aren't wanted. End of story.{hardened mercenary}

topics.topic_text: I can help with your Ghoul problem. Where are they hiding out?
topics.response_text: Really? You? You're welcome to give it a try. But don't come crying to me when you get hurt.{surprised the player has courage}

topics.topic_text: Sure, sounds good. I would have done it for free.
topics.response_text: Yeah right. Good luck soldier. I'm not coming after you to rescue your ass if you get in trouble. You're on your own.{("Yeah right" said skeptically) but happy to find such a good recruit}

topics.topic_text: I'll take it. And any other help you can offer.
topics.response_text: Here, you can take this rifle and ammo. But don't waste it shooting at shadows.{bitter mercenary accepting a volunteer}

topics.topic_text: I'm going to find a non-violent solution to your Ghoul problem.
topics.response_text: That's a laugh. Roy Phillips can't be reasoned with. Trust me. But go ahead and try to talk some sense into him. It's your funeral.{mocking}

topics.topic_text: You want this problem resolved or not? You can spare more than that...
topics.response_text: Well... maybe you're right. It was something I was going to have to do eventually anyway. How about another 200 caps?{grudingly accepting a higher fee}

topics.topic_text: Perhaps the residents could be "persuaded" to let the Ghouls live here.
topics.response_text: You're out of line. Those filthy bitches can stay living in those metro tunnels. They'll move in here over my dead body.{angry}

topics.topic_text: I was just kidding. Ghouls are filthy creatures that should be slaughtered.
topics.response_text: Quite right! You're not such a moron after all.{amused and coming around to like the player}

topics.topic_text: That can be arranged. You don't look like much.
topics.response_text: Are you threatening me? You're obviously an idiot, so I'll let that one slide. But I'm warning you, I won't hesitate to kill you if I have to.{deadly serious}

topics.topic_text: We'll see.
topics.response_text: Whatever.{dismissing an annoying person}

topics.topic_text: Have you even tried talking to the Ghouls? I bet you can work something out.
topics.response_text: Tenpenny doesn't care how big their pile of bottlecaps is. He won't let Ghouls live here. Those Ghouls need to give up and go bother someone else.{annoyed mercenary}

topics.topic_text: Yeah, Ghouls are too much trouble.
topics.response_text: That's right. You never know when they'll go zombie on your ass. Perhaps you're smarter than you look.{grudging respect}

topics.topic_text: You're all bigots.
topics.response_text: Your bleeding heart is liable to get you in a lot of trouble one day.{bitter mercenary telling it like it is}

topics.topic_text: Whatever. It's not really any of my business.
topics.response_text: No, but perhaps it might be.{suggesting player could help}

topics.topic_text: What the hell's a Ghoul anyway? Some kind of diseased human?
topics.response_text: You serious? You don't know what a Ghoul is?

topics.topic_text: How would you feel about having a few Ghoul neighbors?
topics.response_text: HELL NO! Tenpenny won't allow it. And I take my orders from him.{angry mercenary}

topics.topic_text: Yeah, Ghouls don't belong here.
topics.response_text: So why the hell would you even suggest such a retarded idea? Are you done wasting my time?{angry mercenary}

topics.topic_text: What if Tenpenny will let Ghouls live here?
topics.response_text: He'd be out of his goddamn mind... but like I said. Ultimately I work for him, so whatever he says, goes. But I wouldn't like it.{angry mercenary}

topics.topic_text: Whatever.
topics.response_text: Are you done wasting my time?{gruff mercenary}

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: Listen up good. I'm running the show here, not you. Now get out hell out of here!{scoffing at someone offering to help}

topics.topic_text: You got an armament supply? Want to do some trade?
topics.response_text: I guess we could do a little trading. Here's what I got.{gruff mercenary}

topics.topic_text: I can help take care of that little Ghoul problem for you.
topics.response_text: Is that so? And why should I believe that? You ever kill a Ghoul before?{gruff mercenary testing a civilian's mettle}

topics.topic_text: I've killed so many Ghouls, I've stopped counting.
topics.response_text: Is that so? Then I'm sure you can handle yourself out there in the Wasteland just fine. Are you done wasting my time?{gruff mercenary belittling a civilian}

topics.topic_text: I kill Ghouls and rent-a-cops with attitudes who ask too many questions.
topics.response_text: Oh ho! Looks like we got a live one here! I think we better leave this one outside. Good bye, kid. Try not to get eaten by anything out there.{gruff mercenary laughing with his buddies about a punk kid}

topics.topic_text: You going to let me in or not?
topics.response_text: Listen. Like I've told those Ghouls a thousand times, I can't just let in every drifter that lands at the gate.{gruff mercenary barking at a civilian}

topics.topic_text: Maybe you'd accept this 100 caps as "insurance" of my good behavior?
topics.response_text: You're poor, and stupid. Count your damn purse before you go offering people gifts.{gruff mercenary accepting a bribe}

topics.topic_text: Ah come on. Let me in. Pretty please, with sugar on top?
topics.response_text: Ummm. No. Unless by "sugar" you meant to sweeten my day with, say, a gift of 100 caps.{gruff}

topics.topic_text: I'm a little low on caps at the moment.
topics.response_text: This ain't a goddamn soup kitchen. Sorry, kid. Go find a ditch to crawl into and stop bothering me.{gruff mercenary trying to get rid of a pestering vagrant}

topics.topic_text: You won't be getting a bribe from me.
topics.response_text: Then you won't be getting past this gate.{gruff}

topics.topic_text: Let me in asshole!
topics.response_text: Goodbye.{gruffly dismissive}

topics.topic_text: I just want to look around a little. Come on. I won't hurt anybody.
topics.response_text: This ain't a theme park, kid. And even if it was, you wouldn't be able to afford the admission. Now bugger off!{gruff mercenary trying to get rid of an annoying kid}

topics.topic_text: That's where you're mistaken. Does 100 caps sound about right?
topics.response_text: You're poor, and stupid. Count your damn purse before you go offering people gifts.{gruff mercenary accepting a bribe}

topics.topic_text: Come on, let me in. Just for a little while. I won't cause any trouble.
topics.response_text: You're not getting in. Stop trying. It's not working. I'm done talking to you.{gruff mercenary trying to get rid of an annoying person trying to get in}

topics.topic_text: Open the damn gate! I'm done being interrogated by you!
topics.response_text: You're really not in a position to be threatening me. I'm safe on the other side of this wall, and you are out there, exposed and unsafe.{sarcastic}

topics.topic_text: I'm here to see Mister Burke.
topics.response_text: He's expecting you? Why didn't you say so right away? Just a moment...{barking orders at a civilian through an intercomm}

topics.topic_text: Is that how you treat all your guests?
topics.response_text: What? No, just those damn Ghouls. Sorry, thought you were one of them.{angry mercenary calming down}

topics.topic_text: Do you kiss your mother with that mouth?
topics.response_text: What? Oh. Sorry 'bout that. I thought you were one of those damned Ghouls looking for a handout.{gruff mercenary caught off guard}

topics.topic_text: I don't think you're talking to the person you think you are.
topics.response_text: Oh? Thought you were that damn Ghoul. Well then. Back to business as usual. Ahem...{gruff mercenary caught off guard recomposing himself (mildly sarcastic)}

topics.topic_text: I'm here to see Tenpenny.
topics.response_text: Hahaha! That's rich. What would a man like Tenpenny want to do with a Waste-rat like you?{gruff mercenary laughing at a ridiculous notion}

topics.topic_text: I have a lucrative offer for Tenpenny. Let me in, or you'll come to regret it.
topics.response_text: Just a minute. Let's not be hasty. If Tenpenny is interested in what you have to say, I suppose you should get your chance.{gruff mercenary reluctantly letting in someone past his check point}

topics.topic_text: Tenpenny is expecting me. I'm a new tenant. <Lie.>
topics.response_text: Nice try kid! I know everyone who lives here, even the new ones. It's my job, and I take my job very seriously.{gruff mercenary amused at the audacity of the player to lie to him}

topics.topic_text: Just let me in already!
topics.response_text: Nope. Now get the hell out of here.{gruff mercenary}

conversation.response_text: That's right. And the safety's off. Back off.{threatening a man who just hit on him}
I'm sorry? What?!{caught off guard, and covering it with gruff anger}
You're wasting your time. I don't want to have to tell you again. This gun is loaded. I'd hate for it to accidentally go off in your direction.{(angry) telling off a man who hit on him}
Time to take five.{hungry and on his way to get food}
Well, there's another day done.{tired and heading off to bed}
I still got my eye on you.{gruff mercenary}
You got anything to report, Ling?{gruff}
How many times do we have to go through this? You're not getting in!{yelling at a obstinate enemy on the other end of an intercom}
Welcome to Tenpenny Tower! Don't do anything stupid.{gruff mercenary giving a warning to be on best behavior}

combat.response_text: Ghouls! On me!{professional mercenaries fighting an overwhelming force}
That zombie's a real corpse now!{(killed a monster) professional mercenaries fighting an overwhelming force}

description:
Chief Gustavo is a 52 year-old Hispanic Male.

Chief Gustavo is the seasoned security chief of Tenpenny Tower, responsible for protecting its wealthy residents and enforcing Tenpenny's controversial policies. With a stern demeanor and a pragmatic approach to security, he commands respect from both residents and his security team.

Chief Gustavo's Personality: Gruff and no-nonsense, Gustavo maintains a professional demeanor with residents but becomes fiercely protective and aggressive when his team or charges are threatened. He harbors an intense prejudice against ghouls, believing they pose an existential threat to humans and advocating for their elimination.

Chief Gustavo's Backstory: Born in the Capital Wasteland, Gustavo grew up in a harsh environment that shaped his pragmatic worldview. He rose through the ranks of a notorious mercenary band, eventually becoming its leader. During a contract in the D.C. ruins, his band rescued Mister Burke from a raider ambush. Impressed by Gustavo's tactical skills and ruthlessness, Burke recommended him to Allistair Tenpenny, who subsequently hired Gustavo to establish and command the security force for Tenpenny Tower.
